info.title: PSC Filing API (Private)
info.description:
Private specification for the PSC Filings service (currently for PSC07 [Cease a PSC] only).
Includes:
 * Public paths for use by third party software filers and CHS, and
* Private paths for CHS internal users only, and
* Data models for any of PSC01 to PSC09.

---
### NOTE
**Only PSC07 is currently supported**. It requires only the following properties:
* `ceased_on`
* `register_entry-date`
* `reference_psc_id`
* `reference_etag`

get.description: Provide enhanced filing data needed to submit the PSC filing to CHIPS. For internal use by the filing resource handler service.

403.description:
Forbidden 
* The authorization identity type must equal '`key`' and 
* The authenticated user account must have internal user privileges and
* The request must have an API key that has internal application privileges.

500.description:
#### Internal Server Error
The request could not be fulfilled due to:
* The filing resource transaction is not Closed or
* an internal error.

get.description: Check the validity of a PSC filing. When a request is made to the Transaction Service to close the filing resource transaction, that service makes a request to this path. If valid, the Transaction Service closes the transaction and marks it for processing.

200.description:
#### OK The validation operation completed successfully. The `is_valid` property in the response body indicates the validity of the filing. The `errors` property in the response body contains details of any validation errors. #### Examples:
**is_valid** **errors**
true `[]`
false ``` [ { "error": "PSC register entry date must be on or after the date the PSC was ceased", "location": "$.register_entry_date", "type": "ch:validation", "location_type": "json-path" } ] ```

post.summary: Create a filing for an Individual PSC.

post.description: Create a filing for an Corporate Entity PSC.
Create a filing for an Legal Person PSC.

patch.description:
Update permitted properties of a PSC filing resource. Supports adding, replacing or removing properties specified in the request body — see [RFC7396](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7396) for details.
### NOTE
 Certain properties of the filing are **read only**. If present in the request body they will be **ignored**, and `updated_at` will be modified automatically.
* `id`
* `created_at`
* `updated_at` (modified automatically)
* `links`

transactionId.name: transactionId
transactionId.description: The current open transaction ID for the filing resource

pscType.name: pscType
pscType.description: The kind of PSC of the filing resource

filingResourceId.name: filingResourceId
filingResourceId.description: The unique ID of the filing resource

Conflict.description:
#### Conflict
The request could not be fulfilled due to any of:
* The company's type is not one that allows the request:
	- `private-unlimited`
	- `ltd`
	- `plc`
	- `old-public-company`
	- `private-limited-guarant-nsc-limited-exemption`
	- `private-limited-guarant-nsc`
	- `private-unlimited-nsc`
	- `private-limited-shares-section-30-exemption`
* The company's status is one that forbids the request:
	- `dissolved`
	- `converted-closed`
* The company has one or more PSCs whose details are protected.

errors.error: You cannot submit a filing for a company that is Dissolved

CreateFilingBadRequest.description:
#### Bad Request
The request to create a filing resource contains bad data.

errors.error: {rejected-value} must be a date in the past or in the present

FilingFound.description:
#### OK
The response body provides the representation of the found filing resource.

FilingNotFound.description:
#### Not Found
A filing having the specified combination of transaction ID, filing resource ID and PSC type could not be found.

example.description: (PSC07) Notice of ceasing to be a Person of Significant Control for Mr Random Notreal Person on 30 August 2022

Forbidden.description:
#### Forbidden
The filing resource transaction is not in an open state, or the operation is otherwise not allowed.

InternalServerError.description:
#### Internal Server Error
The request could not be fulfilled due to an internal error.

NotCreated.description:
Not Found
The filing resource could not be created due to any of: 
* The transaction ID in the request path does not match an existing transaction or
* The PSC type in the last segment of the path does not match one of the accepted values:
	* `individual`
	* `corporate-entity`
	* `legal-person`

NotFound.description:
Not Found
A filing having the specified combination of transaction ID, filing resource ID and PSC type could not be found.

PscCorporateEntityFilingCreated.description:
#### Created
For convenience the response body provides the representation of the created filing resource.

PscIndividualFilingCreated.description:
#### Created
For convenience the response body provides the representation of the created filing resource.

PscLegalPersonFilingCreated.description:
#### Created
For convenience the response body provides the representation of the created filing resource.

PscFilingUpdated.description:
#### OK
For convenience the response body provides the representation of the updated filing resource.

Unauthorized.description:
#### Unauthorized
Request credentials/authorization are invalid or missing.

UpdateFilingBadRequest.description:
#### Bad Request
The request to update a filing resource contains bad data.

errors.error: {rejected-value} must be a date in the past or in the present
